tools.name: Tailwind
des: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.
一个实用优先的 CSS 框架，用于快速构建自定义用户界面。

tools.name: worldvectorlogo
des: A website providing a large collection of vector logos for free.
提供大量免费矢量标志的网站。

tools.name: Uicons
des: A collection of user interface icons in various styles.
各种风格的用户界面图标集合。

tools.name: CSS Animate
des: A library of ready-to-use, cross-browser animations for use in your web projects.
一个包含现成的、跨浏览器动画库，用于您的网页项目。

tools.name: HTML to JSX
des: A tool to convert HTML code to JSX format for use in React applications.
一个将 HTML 代码转换为 JSX 格式以用于 React 应用程序的工具。

tools.name: Ease Curve
des: A tool for generating tween easing curves for animations.
生成动画缓动曲线的工具。

tools.name: Picture Bed
des: A platform for hosting and sharing images.
一个用于托管和分享图片的平台。

tools.name: UI library
des: A collection of user interface components and libraries.
用户界面组件和库的集合。

description
This website is used to manage daily tools and resources for front-end development. The website is built with React, and the data is stored in a JSON file.

tools.name: Xianzhe Zhang
des: Responsible for frontend development and design. Designing the UI and managing the data.
负责前端开发和设计。设计用户界面和管理数据。

tools.name: William Wong
des: A website providing a large collection of vector logos for free.
提供大量免费矢量标志的网站。
